llm_res.rule: Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!

Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
